page.title: 12Court Farm Produce.
page.content: The{machines}on this farm are a drill,a fertilizer spreader,a sprayer to kill the weeds, a slurry tanker, several trailers, a mower and a potato sorter, which sorts them into sizes. The{crops}grown on this farm are potatoes, wheat, barley and sileage. The wheat has to be ripe and of a high quality for selling. Before wheat can be stored it must have less than {16% moisture}and be very clean. All of the milking cows are Friesians. There are{80}milking cows and{80 followers, which are cows from{2}weeks to{2}years old.After calving some are kept and the others are sent to market where calves are sold for Â£100 and cows for about Â£400.Pure Friesians are bred for better milk produce. After cooling,the milk is collected by blue tankers and taken to Stroud Creamery where it's bottled ready for delivery.
